sentences.english: A rebel force was beguiled into ambush.
sentences.chinese: 一支叛軍受誘騙中了埋伏。

sentences.english: That is because Malian government forces are fighting against rebels .
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲馬裏政府部隊正對抗叛軍。

sentences.english: The rebels say roads to the east of Benghazi are clogged with carloads of terrified families.
sentences.chinese: 叛軍表示，班加西東部的道路被恐懼不安的家庭堵塞。

sentences.english: Lothar defeats the rebels at Northshire.
sentences.chinese: 洛薩擊敗了在北郡的叛軍。

sentences.english: The attacks are in support of the Yemeni government as it battles against a group of rebels called Houthis.
sentences.chinese: 一系列襲擊是爲了支持也門政府對抗胡塞叛軍。

sentences.english: A military commander says former rebels have him cornered.
sentences.chinese: 一位軍事指揮說卡扎菲被前反叛軍監禁。

sentences.english: At the time of writing, the capital of the Tang Dynasty, Chang'an, was already captured by rebel forces.
sentences.chinese: 寫這首詩時，唐代的都城長安已經被叛軍佔領。

sentences.english: He rejected charges that he and Persson had been given weapons training by the rebels.
sentences.chinese: 他否認他和珀森兩人曾經接受叛軍的武器訓練。

sentences.english: On the rebels' banners were the words Zhang Jue the Lord of Heaven written large.
sentences.chinese: 在叛軍的旗幟被這個詞張撅耶和華天上的書面大。

sentences.english: And the West certainly didn’t want Qaddafi to enhance his power and independence by crushing the rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 西方國家當然不想卡扎菲大振軍威粉碎叛軍的叛亂。

sentences.english: The Houthis have taken control of parts of Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 胡塞叛軍已經控制了也門部分地區。

sentences.english: Nine suspected rebels have been arrested, and up to 16 others are still on the run.
sentences.chinese: 9名叛軍嫌疑犯已經被捕，另有16名仍在逃。

sentences.english: Chad blames Khartoum for backing the rebel Union of Resistance Forces.
sentences.chinese: 乍得指責喀土穆支持叛軍抵抗力量聯盟。

sentences.english: But first the rebels will have to consolidate control over the country.
sentences.chinese: 但是首先叛軍必須要鞏固對利比亞各地的控制。

sentences.english: Zhang Xun , instead of following suit , fought bravely with the rebel army.
sentences.chinese: 張巡卻挺身而出，勇敢地抗擊叛軍。

sentences.english: Refugees accuse both government troops and rebels of burning villages in Burundi .
sentences.chinese: 難民們對政府軍和叛軍焚燒村莊的行動表示譴責。

definition: to go on a punitive expedition
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
mutiny/(Tw) to be dumped by one's girlfriend while serving in the army
using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
